updates.update_content:
Test Prints of Physical Rewards
We're excited to have some physical reward test prints to share! For anyone who backed at the Charm Collector level or above, you'll be getting these beauties once everything gets printed and shipped:

updates.update_userinfo: New Characters, New Bugs
updates.update_content:
New Characters
Over the past few weeks, we've been working with the backers who supported at our "help design a character" tiers.  There's still some work to do before this is complete, but Ilse has been having fun with these new character designs, and we have a few to share with you!

updates.update_userinfo: LudoNarraCon Complete, Reward Updates, and a Simple Request
updates.update_content:
LudoNarraCon Complete
The LudoNarraCon Steam event went great! The 3 live streams were fun, and we might put those up on youtube at some point for those who missed it. In the meantime, here are some images from the art stream:

updates.update_userinfo: LudoNarraCon and Physical Rewards
updates.update_content:
LudoNarraCon Begins Today!
If you are a fan of narrative focused games (and we know you are), then you'll want to check out LudoNarraCon. I mentioned in the last update that Beacon Pines will be featured in the event, and it starts today at noon Central Time and lasts until Monday.  The Beacon Pines team will be doing streams on Steam at 1pm Central time each of the four days, so please stop by and join us!

updates.update_userinfo: Beacon Pines in LudoNarraCon!
updates.update_content:
Event Announcement!
It's finally time to let you know about the event we've been teasing out. Beacon Pines will be a featured game at LudoNarraCon this year! We've been fans of LudoNarraCon from it's inception, so it's really exciting to see Beacon Pines featured this year! This digital convention is presented by Fellow Traveller, and showcases the latest innovative games with a narrative focus. LudoNarraCon will be taking place on Steam from April 23rd to 26th and features free playable demos, live-streamed panel discussions, and lots of other great content from over 40 game exhibitors. We are very much honored to be included in this event, and we hope you'll join us at LudoNarraCon!

updates.update_userinfo: Announcement, New Menu, New Art!
updates.update_content:
Introducing Kirsten Mize
In the previous update, I teased out an event announcement for today. It turns out we can't quite announce that yet. But we have another, just as exciting, announcement to make!  After a long and somewhat overwhelming process, we've selected Kirsten Mize to be the voice of the Book/Narrator in Beacon Pines:

campaign.story:
Everafter Falls is a casual, relaxing and enjoyable experience both in solo or co-op mode. 
Everafter Falls is a mix of Stardew Valley/Harvest Moon/Animal Crossing with some Action RPG elements found in the dungeons, all held together with a tightly written story. 
You wake up to discover the life you previously had on Earth was nothing but a simulation. With no memory of this place, you will explore and rediscover the serene and peaceful existence you once had here. Welcome to Everafter Falls.
While you were gone, some things have gone a little astray. Find out why you are needed and what lies in store. Players can complete the game at their own pace and will have an option to continue playing indefinitely even after finishing the core story.

A Pet that will always be by your side...
Your pet comes with 2 basic abilities - Dig and Water. This design decision reduces the amount of tools cluttering up your inventory and makes possible some other interesting mechanics.
Your pet can be taught new abilities. Is your inventory full while traversing the dungeons but you don't want to travel back to town? Send your pet to town to sell off its inventory while you continue exploring.

Need to get out of a tight situation or just reduce travelling time? Yes, Pet teleportation is a thing on Everafter Falls. 
Pet Teleportation is a learnable skill
Grow a huge range of fruits and vegetables
Everafter Falls host a large variety of crops and plants, with some strange and unique species not found on Earth. Discovering and acquiring some of these may not be easy, but will be a rewarding experience. Below is a preview of what you will find in the game, with plans for more to come. 
Harvestable fruit and vegetables
All crops have a good number of visually distinct growth stages so that you know where they are in their growth cycle.
A preview of crop growth stages
Trees fruit at different rates and have a different maximum fruit capacity depending on variety. Waiting until they bear the maximum amount of fruit will yield more fruit over time, compared to harvesting as soon as the first fruits emerge. Discover what other methods can be used to increase fruit yields even further!
Mushrooms can be found in the wild or grown with the right equipment
Craft various drones to help you with farm work, fishing, and general support. Each drone can be enhanced with up to 3 Drone Parts, giving them extra functionality. Support Drones are unique in that they can be equipped and will follow you around.
A Water Drone automatically waters your crops
Choose drone parts to modify drones to suit your needs
A support drone can be equipped to provide extra inventory slots and additional firepower for the Dungeons.
Something I have not spent much time on yet are the farm animals. I plan to have around 5-8 different species that can be bred and will produce valuable goods. Some species may not be familiar to ones on Earth.

One species that has already been decided on is the the Alpaca. I could not resist working on this first. You'll be able to harvest super soft wool from them.
Farm Alpacas for their soft, soft wool
A behind-the-scenes look at animating these little fellas.
What are Pixies?
Pixies are tiny little helpers that can be caught. They can then be placed on various things for different effects. You can sustainably harvest stone from rocks and wood from trees without destroying them using Blue Pixies. Green Pixies will help increase the growth rates of any plant or speed up processing times for the machines you craft! Discover what rare Red Pixies can do - if you ever catch one.
Pixies can harvest resources like wood and stone without destroying the tree or rock

How to catch Pixies
Pixies can be caught by placing edible offerings inside Pixie Shrines. Check back the following day to see if you find a pixie inside it. The quality of the offering and location of the pixie shrine will determine the chances of attracting a Pixie and also type pixie caught. Shrines can be crafted, however, the town center has a Golden Shrine that, once restored, can be used to attract rarer Pixies.
Discover what else pixies can do when you discover them
Restore structures around town and put them to good use
Discover Cards along the way and eat them to gain their powers.
Character progression is handled by earning cards either by completing quests or through special events. More often than not, you will be presented with 3 to choose from so you can decide what direction you want to take that best suits your playstyle. Will you choose cards that help you maximize profits from your farm, or strengthen your skills in combat so you can dive deeper into the dungeons?
Card choices direct character progression
After choosing a card, you'll need to eat it. How else are you going to gain it's powers?
Tastes like cardboard
Explore the peaceful town and meet its inhabitants. Attend festivals, celebrate special events, find hidden areas and help restore things back to their former glory.
One of many areas in town to explore
Penguin Post
All mail in Everafter Falls is delivered through Penguin Post. Pip and Pepper are the penguins that run this service and use carrier Pigeons to do the delivery. Every now and again, you may find a pigeon who has forgotten how to fly. Bring it to the post office where Pip and Pepper (the penguins who run the joint) will give it a job delivering mail.
Mail being delivered by pigeons who have forgotten how to fly
Gradually Changing Seasons
For a more immersive experience, trees change at different rates when the season changes. This small touch not only increase diversity in the environment, but provides a visual cue for when a season is ending and a new one starting.
Trees will change at different rates to indicate the coming of a new season
Personalize your experience and create the character you want to play with many options to choose from.
Character Creation
Make your home yours
There are many types of decorations to find and collect to make your home unique. Below are some examples from each category.
Customize your home with a huge variety of items
Fine tuned decorations, place anything for display on shelves and tables.
Not only can you decorate your house with various furniture including floor furniture, rugs and wall items (clocks, windows), you can also choose what to display on all shelves and tables. In addition to this, most furniture can have its color changed using a potion dye crafted from some unique fruit species.
Fishing and The Town Aquarium
Everafter Falls is a host to many kinds of fish, some you will be unfamiliar with. The Town Aquarium has recently undergone repairs and needs your help to repopulate it. Receive special rewards for collecting as many types as you can.
Fishing is a lucrative business here in Everafter Falls
The town aquarium can showcase every type of fish you've caught
A large number of marine species to discover for those who love to collect!
Combat in this genre has been the area most lacking and I hope to change that trend. Everafter Falls features a dungeon with many levels and lots of enemies to encounter.
The game will have a moderate level of progressing difficulty and will be somewhat challenging if players want to focus solely on traversing the dungeons. For those who prefer a more casual approach, if enough time is spent doing other activities and progressing in other areas of the game, players will acquire items and abilities that can make fighting enemies a breeze.
Taking down enemies is a breeze with help from your Pet and a Support Drone.
Preview of some monsters you'll encounter in the dungeons
Item Drops with random stat generation
Discover unique and powerful items that can help you on your adventure. Items can boost combat stats, or increase farm productivity. They can provide bonuses to your card levels, drones, and pet skills. Enjoy the thrill of finding ultra rare and unique items.
Equipable Items with random stat generation
On this adventure, you'll meet a lot of fun and strange characters along the way. Complete fun and wacky quests to uncover their stories and earn items that will help you on your journey. 
Many characters are waiting to share their stories with you.
Everafter Falls will not have a bachelor/bachelorette system (you are the only human here). Such a system would be difficult to reason for as the intricate relationships between the characters and player is tightly bound to the story. Have fun learning about the characters and their lives and perhaps they may share intimate moments with you if you've earned enough of their trust.
Complete important quests for great rewards.
You’ll be able to make some neat stuff that will help you make other neat stuff! There will be a huge number of items to discover, craft, produce, and refine. Below is a small preview of crafting and equipment processing.
Craft and create machines to help you process items into other valuable and useful goods.
A relaxing, fun, and memorable soundtrack
Everafter Falls will have an Original Soundtrack composed by Tim Carlos. He has already produced some outstanding tracks for the game, please have a listen below. All pledges above the "Post Pigeon" tier will receive the Original Soundtrack digitally.
 If you enjoy what you hear, you can find more about Tim through his website  TimCarlos.com or follow him on Twitter  @tflatminor 

 **Please note that I have mistakenly put "Digital Copy of the Game" and then "Digital Copy of the game at a discounted price" under Pledge Rewards for the "Kickstarter Pricing" tier. Please note only 1 copy of the game is given at this price. 
Reference chart for pledge tiers and rewards
Below is a preview of the exclusive in-game posters, these can only be redeemed by backers with a provided code and cannot be obtained otherwise. Please visit Penguin Post in-game and submit your code. The item will be sent to you via a delivery pigeon!
Preview of Excusive in-game Poster Rewards
The game will be released for PC/Mac/Linux first via Steam in March 2022, with the Nintendo Switch version following several months later. I would love to release on all platforms/consoles, however, as a solo developer, I need to ensure I don't spread myself too thinly to keep the project manageable. The possibility of Playstation and Xbox releases will likely be considered after the game has been released on the Nintendo Switch.
Backers can choose to receive their digital copy of the game on for any available platform but please be aware of the different planned release dates. These are fairly conservative dates but are still estimates and may change.
Alpha testing is planned to start mid 2021, and the Beta testing towards the end of 2021.
The Digital Art Book will include exclusive WIP images, character designs and some fantastic artwork commissioned by various artists.
Commissioned artwork by Daniel Bogni
Commissioned artwork by Jamsino
I was raised in Australia, but was born in Cambodia. My family and I were lucky enough to have immigrated to Australia during the Khmer Rouge era. I am very fortunate to have had the education I had in Australia, without it, I wouldn't be in the position I am now.
I moved back to Cambodia at the age of 32 hoping for a new direction in life. Thanks to the lower cost of living, moving back here has afforded me the opportunity to work almost full time on this game for nearly 3 years now.
These last 3 years have been spent juggling game development, freelance design work, and being a father to my now 2 year old son.
I chose to do this Kickstarter so I can focus on doing what I love, which is working on this game. Additionally, It would help me with funding for the Original  Soundtrack. I am also hoping to create a community of fans that can provide feedback and help shape the game into the best it can be.
All the core systems have been completed and are in a playable state, with a decent amount of content complete. Much more content is planned, and a lot more time needs to be spent on the combat/dungeons. 
I set out from the very start to create a game I would enjoy, in a genre that has rekindled my love for gaming. I have poured a lot of love and energy into making it what it is today. A successful campaign will take a load off my shoulders and provide enough funding to last the rest of development.
I am extremely grateful for anyone backing this project, with your support, I hope to develop a game that will provide you many hours of wholesome fun. Thank you so much!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Having poured everything in into this project for nearly 3 years now, I am fully aware of the difficulties and challenges faced with developing and shipping a game alone.

After going public with the game a couple of months ago, I've been overwhelmed with the positive response and show of support. I aim to do my best to release a game that will not disappoint.

I originally aimed for a release date at the end of 2021, however, have since pushed it back to mid 2022 to be a little more conservative with timing and to better meet expectations for the launch date.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: An update about the status of the development of Everafter Falls
updates.update_content:
Firstly, I'd like to wish everyone a happy new year and hope you all have had a great start to the year.
I apologize for the lack of updates as I have had a little bit of a tough time with Covid forcing nurseries to close where I am. I've been struggling a little trying to take care of my Son by myself at the moment. The nurseries have recently opened up again the past week, I've managed to spend what time I have making as much progress on the game as I can.

updates.update_userinfo: Fishing Minigame, Tilling soil/watering simultaneously with your pet, and working on art assets
updates.update_content:
Thanks to the 1347 people who helped Everafter Falls reach 150% funded.
We've also manage to hit the additional Pet stretch goal which means you'll have the option to choose your trusty sidekick when you embark on this adventure!

I absolutely adore the community that has built up around the game - your excitement, dedication and support so far has been more than I could ever dream of.  I have been itching to get back to working on the game and showing off some new updates, I will be posting development progress as Kickstarter updates to keep you all informed.

updates.update_userinfo: 150% Funded and our Pet stretch goal reached! Plus fanart winners announced!
updates.update_content:
There have been some amazing entries for the Fan Art contest, I've been blown away by all the time and dedication people have spent on creating some really great artwork of the game.

It has been a surreal experience for me seeing world and characters in the game come to life via the hands talent of other people. I hadn't given much thought about this aspect of game development when starting this project, but it is a very humbling experience.

updates.update_userinfo: The Everafter Falls Fan Art contest ends and Voting begins!
updates.update_content:
We've reached 100%, thank you so much to everyone who has helped the campaign succeed, either through backing or help spreading the word.

I just want to let you know how much this means to me.
Working on this game alone has been a hugely rewarding experience, but also an extremely challenging one.

updates.update_userinfo: Everafter Falls is 100% FUNDED! Plus some new artwork and a shout out to Chrono Sword.
updates.update_content:
As we approach 90% funded,  I thought I'd take this opportunity to announce some stretch goals for the game.

Multiple pet options has been often asked about so this is the first goal set!
Many of you have been extremely helpful with spreading the word and directly offering me advice on where I should promote the game. I'm grateful to have such a passionate and caring community around the game already, I couldn't ask for a better group of people.

updates.update_userinfo: Wow, almost 90% Funded! Some stretch goals announced!
The Everafter Falls Fan Art Contest
updates.update_content:
Hello all!
As we approach the 60% mark, I'm feeling very confident and optimistic about hitting our goal. Again, this is thanks to each and every one of you, I'm extremely luck to have your support!

A lot of people have asked me about the split-screen co-op mode and while I've updated the FAQ to answer the, I thought I'd address it in this update as suggested by one my backers.

updates.update_userinfo: Split Screen Co-op footage and some clarification on this mode
updates.update_content:
Hello everyone!
If you have been following me on Twitter on hanging out on our Discord, you are probably already aware about a new video showing off some gameplay footage for the game. For those who haven't seen it yet, you can view it here with some insightful commentary by SharkyGames.

project_data.project_name: Everafter Falls: A Farming Sim RPG

campaign.story:
Game Informer took a look at 12 minutes of gameplay! "She's got pumpkin boobs, how is that not game of the year?" :P Thank you Kim, Alex, Jeff, and Liana!
 https://youtu.be/q6hYVrCjos8 

UPDATE: You can now play as female Drac! Thank YOU for all your feedback!
Romancelvania is a visually stunning action RPG coming to Switch/PS4/PS5/Steam/XboxSeriesX/XboxSeriesS that features in-depth weapon and magic based combat, exploration based platforming, and a cast of gorgeous monsters that you won’t be able to resist.
Most foes don't stand a chance against Drac's arsenal of powers, including Impale.
Increase your powers by feeding on human "Production Assistants" who throw themselves at Drac, the star of the show.
Coming to Nintendo Switch, PS4, PS5, XBoxSeriesX/S and Steam
 Introducing the Thirsty Metroidvania - Romance your way across Transylvania, encounter absurd monsters, craft weapons, learn magic, and more.
 Build your castle - Grow the party mansion as you convince more cast members to move in, and decide where monsters live to get stat and skill bonuses. 
 Enjoy the Showmance - Take the cast members on outlandish dates, massage your sweetheart to unlock more conversation options, and spend time getting to know these supernatural hotties.
Fight or flirt with the Van Helsings?
You play as the legendary playboy vampire himself, Drac, as he battles and romances his way across Transylvania. After being reluctantly recruited by the Grim Reaper to star in a “reality dating show,” he's on a mission to find the world's most eligible monsters, get them to move into his party mansion, and restore his former glory by killing everything in his path along the way.
Things are about to get...spicy.
 ANNOUNCING: Limited Run physical copies!
Like top-shelf physical copies? The mighty Gods at Limited Run have you covered!
It wouldn't be a reality show without DRAMAAAAAA! And our diverse cast brings the goods. Inspired by everything from mythology, classic Universal monsters, to...Jersey Shore? Here are some of the wild monsters Drac will need to wine and dine.
Oh, you think that's all? Oh no, no, no. We have lots more over-the-top reality show monsters in store for you. Stay tuned as we reveal more characters!

Update! Introducing...Frank(enstein)
Enemy turned cast member (and potential love interest!). Be careful though...he's a monster before he's had his coffee.
What's a reality show without trouble? Clawdia, the show's werecheetah is a vortex of disorder. Like most cats.
When the Grim Reaper notices his best client, Drac, has lost his bloodlust for the afterlife, he sets Drac up with a reality TV show to try to get his groove back. Drac must now traverse the perilous countryside of Transylvania on a hunt for the world’s most eligible monsters. Once he has wooed them, they’ll move back into his party mansion, where their rowdy exploits will be documented by the camera crew. Will Drac find “Love at first Bite”, or will he discover “Love Sucks”?
“Terrorizing the townsfolk just wasn’t fun anymore. Then Grim suggested putting the ‘lust’ back in bloodlust and I thought, you know what, he’s right.”
It should go without saying that Drac and Grim's relationship is...complicated. They're long-time (eons) bffs, but they also are, how shall we say, business associates. Drac brings Grim a lot of "business." And when Grim notices Drac is not producing the same numbers he used to, well, it was time for drastic measures.
The thirst is strong with this one.
Grim offers to rebuild Drac's castle. When Drac appeases the mad creator with over-the-top combat and scintillating romance, Grim adds more rooms! As cast members move in, Drac can furnish their rooms to keep them happy and receive benefits, based on where the characters are slotted. You may feel a special connection to Ilessa, but really enjoy peppering enemies with Rat Darts, a Trick that Eden teaches you. You'll have to weigh growing your relationship vs your powers. Decisions, decisions!
Gothic castle or party mansion? Why not both? Choose carefully where you slot cast members.
Romancelvania includes a number of diverse lands to explore. From a desert made entirely of desserts like churro cacti, to the All Seeing Swamp where you can’t escape from the watchful eyes of Grim and his lackeys. 
We’re taking the combat and exploration of Metroidvanias and pairing them with the most appealing aspects of dating games. This allows us to merge the excitement of action platformers with meaningful narrative, taking both genres to new heights! Also, our "hub world" of the mansion allows players to choose their playstyle - if you prefer more dating, spend more time in the mansion and have every conversation possible! If you'd rather get back to the action, use the hubworld sparingly and just grab quests and essentials there. We want to give the player choices in how they interact with Romancelvania's world!
Let's dig into some of the specifics.
Drac's signature weapon, The Impaler, in action! Here, Drac fights a pair of "Screaming Jellyfish" on a giant set Grim built. Grim goes to ridiculous lengths to bring a bit of flair to the combat and platforming.
Whip it good!
Drac’s signature weapon is “The Impaler,” a devastating long spear. He's grown quite accustomed to it over the centuries...to the point where Grim needs to offer a way to "mate" Drac's precious Impaler with other weapons Drac finds on his adventure. 
Drac simply needs to place the Impaler alongside the newly found weapon in the Weapon Motel, toss in a few crystals and voila...out pops in a new weapon born of the Impaler bloodline. Each new combination of weapon and crystal yields an exciting new tool!
Romancelvania’s upgrade system is a bit like the Horadric Cube in Diablo 2, or cooking in Breath of the Wild.
Drop in a weapon, toss in some crystals and “mate” your weapons.
Mate your weapons to take your combat to new heights!
By adding crystals into the slots in The Weapon Motel, players can imbue a new weapon with different traits, elemental effects, and other surprises.
Grim is after ratings. And there's no better way to win over the crowd than a flashy coup de grâce. You better bring your fighting game skills though - these attacks are performed by a special combination of key presses. 

Tricks are items that assist in combat by allowing for different attack patterns. They are meant to add spice and supplement weapon combat.
So long Big Chungus!
But with all this slaying, Drac's gotta find time to unwind...and get to know the cast so he can find the love of his afterlife! Romancelvania has a number of ways you can get close.
Whisk your castmates on extravagant dates around the world, or select the one who's stolen your cold, lifeless heart and profess your love on a special custom outing. 
We have a saying on the team "naughty not dirty." This is about building relationships. Even though we also "slay and lay" the game is much more about building tension and not about graphic nudity.
You are my wish.
We have numerous opportunities for conversation with each cast member, and you can get to discover what makes them tick. 
Sparks fly when Drac discovers his ex is one of the contestants.
Romancelvania thinks the key to your heart can be picked like a lock, so introducing: the Massage minigame. Is a character tense? Are they holding back? Offer a massage! If they accept, you can unlock new conversation and date options!
Become the master of unknotting!


Gigantic, over-the-top bosses are an integral part of Metroidvanias. They fit naturally in the reality TV show setting as obstacles Grim puts in front of Drac to help get higher ratings and excitement from the audience.
Here are a few of our boss fights:
Lulu Cthulhu

Giant Spaghetti Monster
What evil lurks at Grim's new favorite restaurant, the Meatball Garden?
Middle-aged Mutant Ninja Cerberus
Time to pull out the Rat Darts
The show has many production assistants. There are human sycophant "bloodbags" who volunteer their time (and well-being) for the good of the show. And perhaps most importantly of all, Battaboom - Drac's own personal assistant!  He will help you out in combat with a variety of ways, including serving as a pack mule and delivering Drac blood when he needs it most!
 Edit: Female Drac is no longer a stretch goal - but a reality! :) 
More to unlock as we go!
We've got some REWARDS, fam! From cool swag Geekify's creating for us, to Limited Run physical copies, we've got you COVERED! Check out the rewards below!
Don't forget - you can ADD ON to existing tiers, a Limited Run PHYSICAL COPY! All tiers, unless specified, include DIGITAL copies but all you need to do to get a physical copy is just hit the "add on" button. 


Limited Run Games is a Raleigh-based publisher founded in 2015 that focuses on preserving games in a physical format. Publishing over 300 games in its lifetime and winning awards for its bespoke Collector’s Editions, Limited Run is the gold standard in bringing digital-only games to physical form for casual fans and collectors alike. Visit limitedrungames.com for the latest offerings, or follow the brand on your social media platform of choice for all LRG-related updates: @limitedrungames.
Add-ons can only be added if you have selected the $60 level or more reward.
Simply add on whatever items you like to your pledge! We have some exciting stuff to offer. 
If you have any questions, feel free to shoot us a quick email at amanda@thedeependgames.com
 But wait, there's more! If you want to help promote Romancelvania, you can earn even more! Check out our Backer Achievements! 
The more you share, the more you earn!
Other folks who have lent a hand include: Art Director Ronin: Nate Wells, Keith Shetler, Mike Nevins, Joey Pagano, Amanda Kessler, Heriberto Calderon, Joseph Tavano, Jordan Kegler. I love you Ken.

We got by with a little help from our friends! We have been lucky enough to collaborate with many uber-talented companies.
Thank you Skymap Games. Your enormous talent and loyalty has been key in helping us juggle all that we have taken on thus far. 

Additionally, thank you to thank The Molasses Flood, and Beyond FX for lending a hand.

Epic Games was kind enough to award us an Epic Mega Grant. This is amazing! For years Epic has helped developers with amazing tools and resources. To be part of this prestigious honor bolsters our confidence and drives our creativity daily. 
We are honored and grateful to have been awarded COVID support funds from Sony PlayStation. Thank you for helping us build our dream game!
 Limited Run, you folks rock! We are elated to be working with you on this.
Aside from the AMAZING physical copies, Geekify is providing our physical Reward Tiers. We've worked with them in the past and they create some unbelievably cool goods you just have to get your hand on.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We love making games.

That said, these are strange times. While our team has made games before (BioShock, BioShock Infinite, Saints Row, Perception, etc), we haven't made one during a worldwide pandemic. 

But we have worked remotely. We made Perception from our basement. Time and again, we've been faced with unusual circumstances, and we've made better games for it. We believe Romancelvania will be one of these games to overcome the trying times and make something that will bring people joy.

This motivation, above all others, is what drives us.

In terms of timing: we are targeting late 2021. However, we are putting in March 2022 because we realize that development is unpredictable. It all depends on our funding amount - the more stretch goals we hit, the better. Ultimately, it is far more important to deliver a game that meets the expectations of our fans than to hit a date. We have already built a significant portion of the game, but we do have a lot of work to do. We have also spent years building up an incredible network of hugely talented individuals and companies who are chomping at the bit to help out more on the project. In short, every bit of additional funding goes toward adding more to the game. We have huge plans for Romancelvania and hope to build a world we can continue to expand upon in the future. 
 
We have carefully budgeted and planned this project and we pride ourselves on being brutally honest with ourselves. We will be working extremely hard to meet your expectations and we will keep you informed along the way. Thank you again for the opportunity to make this game happen!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Cast updates, environments, and enemies!
updates.update_content:
Hello there Romancelvania community!
We realize it's been a hot minute since we have updated you, and we want to apologize for the delay in updates. Between the end of the school year, and the focus on a lot of new tech (e.g. we just implemented an entirely new conversation system!) we lost track of time. We have so much juicy content to catch you up on so hold onto your butts! Here's just a taste of some of the cool stuff we've been adding.

updates.update_userinfo: More on the lovely Nefret and details on a couple more enemies
updates.update_content:
Hi there Romancelvania community!
It's a new month which means it's time to give you some juicy updates!

Backerkit Pledges
First off, we wanted to let our Backerkit pre-order store backers know that we will be collecting your pledges this Friday. You don’t need to do anything, we just wanted to give you a head up. The store in the future will collect funds at the time of checkout. Thank you again for your support!

updates.update_userinfo: Happy Valentine's Day!!!
updates.update_content:
It’s update o’clock!
January was a busy month and we wanted to share some new content with you! As Grim would say, “Spill that tea!”
Backerkit info:
First off we wanted to communicate to the Backerkit backers super quick (KS people, you don’t need to read this section). We will tentatively be collecting your pledge funds in the next two or three weeks. Moving forward we will charge any Backerkit orders at the time of checkout. We will also communicate this through our social media channels and Discord right before we deduct the funds. Thank you for your support and patience! If anything should change. Keep an eye out here or any of our social media channels.

updates.update_userinfo: Happy holidays to the amazing Romancelvania community!
updates.update_content:
We wanted to take a moment and update you on a few things!

First off we want to welcome all the wonderful BackerKit backers to our community! We are so happy to have you along for the ride! We do want to communicate a few things just to the BackerKit preorder store backers. (Kickstarter backers you can skip ahead***). We at the moment are not collecting funds from your purchases, but we promise your orders are live. We will be collecting funds some time after the holidays. We will send out an update here on Kickstarter and our social media pages to give you a heads up on when we will collect, so make sure to check in :)

updates.update_userinfo: Thankful for you all!
updates.update_content:
Hard to believe that it's been almost a week since we all geared up and created such a mind-blowing rally. We have not stopped gushing about what an amazing ride that was. We're elated that we were able to find such a passionate audience.
Over the past week, we have spent a bit of time recovering from that final push (and a month of super hard work!) We have also been planning, organizing feedback, talking with partners to help make the best game possible, and just gearing up again.

updates.update_userinfo: Love, passion, grit, determination, and community
updates.update_content:
That's the update. We actually did it and it's all thanks to YOU.
Lots to talk about, plan, celebrate, and create, but for now, know that we will be thanking you all for a long time coming. 

Today you have made dreams come true!

updates.update_userinfo: WE DID IT!
updates.update_content:
It's only been a few HOURS but WOW has the landscape changed! We are 88% funded, fam! And this is thanks to YOU! We have received COUNTLESS messages of support, little notes about how you've upgraded your pledges, tweets about how you've asked friends to support us.
We. Are. Blown. Away. 
Thank you, thank you, thank you. You've given us this second wind!

updates.update_userinfo: 88% funded! New add ons! Let's GOOOOOO!
updates.update_content:
Guys, this thing may just be possible! Our incredible backers on our Discord server realized that if everyone upped their pledge by just a bit - right now, $18, we'd fund this thing!
We know it's a hard time right now for a lot of people - 2020 has been a garbage fire and a half - but if you are able to toss in an additional $18, we could make it and not have to go with Plan B! 
So shout it from the rooftops! Whisper it in DM's! Toss in the cost of a pizza and we'll make it worth your while! GO TEAM GO!

project_data.project_name: Romancelvania - a hilarious video game genre mashup

campaign.story:
The Collectors USB Cassette series from Huey Games features the finest selection of retro-style games, delivered on a unique, nostalgia-inducing physical format.
Badged as release 007 in the series, the Collectors USB Cassette of Relic Hunters Zero: Remix is an exclusive physical edition of this classic game for Windows & Mac (DRM-free), designed to slot seamlessly into your retro gaming collection. This unique format allows us to load the USB drive with a tonne of special features including soundtrack albums, artwork, retro archives and more.
There are two types of USB Cassette available for backers - the £25 Collectors version and the premium £45 Ultra USB Cassette. There is also a super-exclusive Elite Edition bundle for £80.
£25 - Kickstarter backers SAVE £4.99 compared to the standard retail price!
The Collectors USB Cassette comes shrink wrapped in a genuine cassette jewel case, with colour printed labels and inlay - exactly like your classic cassette games.
£45 - Kickstarter backer EXCLUSIVE!
Upgrade to the Ultra USB Cassette for a premium fold-out inlay, exclusive UV-LED printed finish on the cassette with spot varnish logo, ultra verification card, obi-strip presentation sleeve and extra bonus features, in addition to everything from the Collectors tier.
£80 - Kickstarter backers EXCLUSIVE!
Everything from the Ultra tier plus you get an exclusive optical crystal award, etched with the 006 logo and Elite Backer emblem, and a signed Certificate of Authenticity verifying you as an Elite Backer.
From the creators of the massively popular Relic Hunters Universe comes Relic Hunters Zero: Remix. Alongside a community of millions of fans from around the world, meet the Relic Hunters as they prepare for landing on Collectors USB Cassette!
Follow the crew of the Spaceheart as they run, gun, and dodge their way through unrelenting force as they race for the ancient relics against the evil Ducans. Assume control as one of the Relic Hunters and venture through several different game modes in this frantic, 2D, twin-stick, shooting roguelike. Power-ups, a bounty of weapons, charmingly unique characters, and the support of a dedicated community perfectly blend together to create an experience that has been years in the making.
 Seven Playable Characters - Each Relic Hunter comes equipped with unique stats, skills, and skins, allowing for diverse playstyle and combat
 Multiple Explosive Game Modes - Classic 12-level "Adventure" Mode with unlockable relics and items; challenging "Endless" Mode with unique mechanics and economy; "Storm" Mode that progressively increases in difficulty and chaos
 Daily Content - Show off your combat prowess and see how you rank against your fellow Hunters in Daily Mode, where everyone faces the same random challenge
 Couch Co-Op - Up to 2 players can team up in local multiplayer for new strategies and battle tactics (Dual Joy-Con and Nintendo Switch Pro Controller support)
 Progressive Original Chiptunes Soundtrack - Energetic tracks to amp you up as you beatdown swarms of Ducans
 Overcome Tough Enemies & Mini-Bosses - Be cautious of the powerful Ducan commanders who will rise up to overwhelm you and your team
 Powerful Community-Built Weapons - Explore the Asteroid Dungeon Nemesis riddled with a myriad of different weapons, some designed by members of the Relic Hunters community
 In-Game Achievements - Track and unlock achievements for a variety of challenges you'll face 
In addition to the DRM-free Windows & Mac versions of Relic Hunters Zero: Remix, the USB Cassette also comes loaded with a host of special features:
Over 2000 page scans of magazine covers, adverts, charts, interviews, maps, tips, contests, previews and reviews of Hewson games.
Mark Venturelli (Game Designer)
With over a decade of games industry experience, Mark has seen it all, working independently and with publishers big and small. He also filled the role of Designer and Producer in Chroma Squad and Dungeonland, and in Relic Hunters Zero he coded the entire game from scratch. Loves games about shooting and/or looting, cooking, playing the guitar and his two rescue cats “Raj” and “Fuça”. His favorite character is Pinkyy - he even has a Pinkyy tattoo!
Betu Souza (Art Director)
Betu’s track record in game development is flawless: Knights of Pen & Paper, Chroma Squad, Relic Hunters Zero and Galaxy of Pen & Paper. He is also a circus artist who can often be found upside down or hanging from ropes, or skating downhill on Sundays. His favorite character is Jimmy - the first one he designed for Relic Hunters!
Raphael Müller (Sound Designer)
Raphael has been Mark’s inseparable partner since they began to make games over 10 years ago. An outright legendary composer and designer, he has worked on a massive list of games that include Dungeonland, Chroma Squad, Relic Hunters Zero and Galaxy of Pen & Paper. This German-born (but Brazilian at heart) composer loves sushi and chocolate, languages and literature, travelling and trekking. His favorite character is Raff, which Betu designed as a “thank you” for being such a sweetheart and working on Relic Hunters Zero for free!
Cat Arthur (Composer - Relic Hunters Zero: Remix)
Cat wrote all of the music for Remix’s brand new soundtrack! Working with the Akupara team since Whispering Willows, they’ve become the go to maestro for all things music and sound design. Honored to give a new coat of earpaint to such a beloved game, Cat focused on composing something really unique for Relic Hunters’ action-packed gameplay. Blending progressive rock and Genesis-era chiptunes created an energetic, complex, nostalgic, and epic soundtrack that never takes itself too seriously.
Hailing from Ventura, California and currently residing in Los Angeles, Cat enjoys eating burritos, lifting weights, and hanging out with their two cats, King Donut and Tango.
Their favorite character is Ace, because Cat has bad taste.
Ashley Sarroca (2D Artist - Relic Hunters Zero: Remix)
Ashley has been an invaluable member as a 2D artist to Akupara Games, dating as far back to 2013. She has worked on the visuals of titles such as Whispering Willows, The Metronomicon, and many others. She joined in on the team to provide the visual overhaul for Relic Hunters Zero: Remix that takes the “classic” designs of the original characters and brings them closer to their representation in the upcoming Relic Hunters Legend. Not only did she provide the character portraits, which can be toggled on/off, she also did the sprite work that really brings the game further to life.
A graduate of Savannah College of Art and Design (SCAD) with a BFA in Game Development and Concept Art, she currently resides in Jacksonville, FL. Ashley is currently working as a background artist on a webcomic called “Doomsday, My Dear”.
Huey Games continues the legacy of Andrew Hewson's famous 1980s software house, which published hit titles on cassette including Uridium, Paradroid, Nebulus, Cybernoid, Exolon, Avalon, Quazatron and many more.
Rob Hewson, previously a Game Director on the LEGO series of games, and John Ogden, a veteran Technical Lead of more than 2 decades, head up the modern studio. Huey Games creates, ports and publishes games for consoles, PC, Mac and mobile.
We're producing the Collectors USB Cassette for you to enjoy and appreciate, and we want to be as transparent as possible about the process. We vouch to provide regular updates on the progress of the project via Kickstarter, and to let you know about our successes and challenges along the way.
A special thanks to GamesYouLoved who are supporting this campaign. GamesYouLoved is born out a love of retro games of every description from your childhood. By being reminded of the retro games through images and video, what people say about them and things you were doing at the time, you are unlocking these memories to see, share and enjoy. They love retro gaming!
Sub: www.youtube.com/gamesyouloved
Follow: www.twitter.com/gamesyouloved
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/gamesyouloved
Site: www.gamesyouloved.com
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Huey Games have run and delivered on successful Kickstarter campaigns of our own, and have worked on or promoted successful Kickstarter campaigns for other people too.

Relic Hunters Zero: Remix is a complete game, but we are dependent on our suppliers for the USB Cassettes. Having worked with the supplier on multiple past projects, we have established a good business relationship and we trust them to deliver, but we cannot rule out all risk of problems or delays with the delivery of the USB Cassettes.

The majority of the bonus content for the USB Cassettes is already mastered, but there is a small risk of some content changing or being replaced before final delivery, especially for any stretch goal content which has not already been produced. As with our previous campaigns, we take pride in delivering quality products and will always aim to over-deliver and to replace any problematic content with content of equivalent or superior value.

Thank you for your support and faith. It means everything to our team.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
Our Collectors USB Cassettes are as sturdy as real cassettes, but without the risk of tangled tape.
Reusability and recyclability
Our community of backers tend to be serious collectors who keep and treasure these items as part of their life-long video games collections. However, we will take back any unwanted products to keep them out of landfills.
Sustainable Distribution
We use cardboard packaging exclusively for shipping the rewards. Please reuse or recycle the packing when you receive your rewards.

updates.update_userinfo: Shipping Underway!
updates.update_content: We are delighted to report that your rewards are being shipped TODAY, assuming you have completed your survey. For those who haven't please do so as soon as you can. Also, please check your messages / emails from us, as we needed to clarify a couple of things with a few of you.

updates.update_userinfo: Surveys Sent + Shipping Update
updates.update_content:
You should have received your Kickstarter survey to confirm your shipping address, so please be sure to complete this when you get a moment. Apologies to any Spinch #006 backers who also received a duplicate survey, these were sent in error.
Shipping Update
Our aim is still to ship your rewards in January. We are currently waiting for the final game build to come through before we can order all of the stock with the files pre-loaded. We are hoping to do this before Christmas so we can be ready to ship in January, will keep you posted!
8-Bit Symphony Campaign

updates.update_userinfo: What a finish!
updates.update_content:
Thank you all so much for pushing the campaign all the way in the final days and hours. With your incredible support, we reached £4498!
Okay... so technically that is £2 short of hitting stretch goal 1, but don't worry, I found a shiny £2 coin down the back of the sofa this morning, so I am happy to confirm we will indeed be including the exclusive sticker with every cassette.

updates.update_userinfo: We did it!
updates.update_content:
We are 100% funded! Thank you all for the extra effort to push the campaign over the line, as always we are incredibly grateful for your support.
YOU ROCK!
Now, lets see if we can hit the first stretch goal before the campaign ends!
Stretch Goal 1: #007 Sticker

updates.update_userinfo: 93% funded - FINAL WEEK!
updates.update_content: There's just one week left to push Relic Hunters Zero Remix over the line. We are so close to getting it funded, but we need your help to spread the word. Let's all give this a big push over the coming days by telling friends, sharing and retweeting!

updates.update_userinfo: 57% Funded in 24 Hours!
updates.update_content: What a wonderful community of collectors we have supporting the Collectors USB Cassette series. 57% funded in the first 24 hours is a fantastic start to the campaign, so thank you all.

project_data.project_name: Relic Hunters Zero: Remix - Collectors USB Cassette #007

campaign.story:
Anitons is an open world monster-collecting RPG. It’s also our dream game and would be more than pleased to deliver it to you! We, as monster taming genre fans, want to make something unique and never seen before. Take a look at Anitons early gameplay footage:
Anitons is an open world monster-collecting RPG where you start your adventure in the wilderness, fight wild Anitons, and collect your own unique Anitons. Every Aniton you obtain can help you fight and farm. Expand your base to fit all monsters in your collection - decorate walls and place bamboo sticks to make Pangeros feel at home. Happy and well-fed Aniton will fight better and help you gather resources. Catch every known Aniton, battle other players, build the biggest farm or just get lost in a world full of life!
Features:
Explore a vast open-world where you can find wild Anitons and useful resources. At first, getting by in the wilderness will not be an easy task, but as you collect and evolve more powerful Anitons, you will find a way to be invincible.
Control your Anitons in real-time combat and use the various skills you've taught them. During a fight, it is not only the strategy that plays a role but also agility and accuracy.  Fighting with wild Anitons won’t always be a fair fight, prepare to face dozens of enemies at once!

Evolve various Anitons, acquire new moves, or breed a completely new one. To do this you will need DNA points. You can obtain these by either farming this specific type of Aniton, or by fighting them in the wild. Forge your own path!
Invite multiple friends and play together. You can team up to fight Aniton Hordes on Raids, or build a new base with your friends. Use PvP duels to fight other players and test new tactics. Offline mode will of course still be an option for those who want to play solo.  Note: this feature is linked to the “Multiplayer” stretch goal.
Found your own base using resources you obtain from the wild. There, you can keep all of your Anitons and make them feel at home. You can not only place buildings but also customize the environment around you! Create a cozy place for you and your Anitons to rest after a tough fight.

Farm various monsters and resources that you will find useful throughout your journey. Each type of Aniton prefers a different kind of food. Well-fed Aniton will use his unique ability that will aid you in this aspect! Electric types can charge machines that will automate your work, fire types can heat your house, and water types can help grow your crops.
Customize your character to perfectly fit your playstyle and Aniton squad. Unlock new outfits as you progress by completing various challenges. You can also build your mansion, paint walls, and hang pictures of your friends and favorite Anitons!
Since the beginning of the development, we’ve been transparent with our goals and development process and we’ll keep on doing this until the full release. We organized a couple of contests where fans could create their own Anitons or name existing ones. If you want to shape the final look of the Anitons, join our discord here:  >>>CLICK<<<
STORY
The world of Anitons is divided into smaller areas that are habited by different kinds of monsters. On the volcanic grounds, you can find various fire type Anitons, and if you are looking for crystal types, you should visit the underground, monster-infested caves. As the player, you can freely explore this open-world continent and return to your base at any time.

There are 9 different types of Anitons. Each type has its own unique playstyle and skillset. You can choose Nature for its ability to heal or stick with Rock for its defensive skills. If on the other hand, you’re going to fight a whole bunch of enemies at once, Fire, with its area effect skills might just be perfect for you. If you’re playing with a friend, choose a combination that will increase your damage output like Water and Electric. The dual-typed Anitons only multiply already almost endless possibilities. Find your playstyle!
You start out by visiting your Uncle that lives overseas, in search of a job. You decide to help him finish his project of a lifetime - gather information about every existing Aniton. Little you know how this goal will change your life. Not only you have to build your own base, but also collect every Aniton out there. Even with the help of your friends... This might take a while.
Enough about the task, which one of these little fellas would you choose?
Anitons are the creatures living in the wild or with humans. You can create your own Anitons that will happily help you with fighting, or farming. All of your monster friends have to live somewhere, a cozy farm is perfect for them. Every Aniton loves to play, and have his favorite food that the owner must provide. With time your monsters will get experienced and will evolve into more powerful forms. During your adventure, you will meet and collect tons of them.
While going into the wild you can take up to 6 Anitons with you. They will help you travel, gather resources, and fight. If any of your monsters faint during the battle, you will have to take care of him after returning to your farm. Each Anioton can learn skills as they evolve, and the last stage can master up to 3 different abilities. While fighting the player takes control of the monster, to win he will have to use both accuracy and a tactic.
The Stegra line is the most popular three-stage evolution. You can evolve your Aniton to more powerful forms and with each evolution, it can learn new skills. Since this specific line is a mix of Rock and Nature type, while choosing a new ability for your monster you can either pick supportive Nature abilities or go with defensive Rock skills.
The Tadapas line is composed of toxic type Anitons. In the first stage Tadapas has an additional water typing that the next stage evolution is missing. This means that your Tadapas can have a water ability, but since first form ability is known from the beginning, you'll have to create a Tapadas with the exact skill that you are looking for. Using more DNA you can boost your chances to get better Anitons in creation process.
The Ottim line is different from most of the other Aniton lines. After getting enough experience to evolve, you can choose its new stage. Since Ottim's passive ability is to find random crystals, the evolution you choose will additionally influence its skill. Fishtter is a more defense-oriented evolution that will find blue crystals for you, whilst Sharker is a more offensive form that will find mostly red crystals.

To gather funding for the Anitons project we've prepared unique rewards for you to choose from. Hope you will find something just perfect for you. All gathered funds will be used for the development of the game.




During the development of our previous game, we decided that we want to become independent in terms of the production of our next title. This will provide a way to make Anitons with our community and by this, make Anitons a game of your dreams too. Success in Kickstarter will help us stay indie and provide a way to keep on developing this game. At this point in time, we cannot say if we’ll be able to develop Anitons if we won’t hit our initial $75k stretch goal, but with fans as you, this shouldn’t be our concern.
We’ve been working for almost one year to create a sharp vision of Anitons that you can see today, and we reach a point when we have to start full production. If you become a backer and trust us, this game will become yours and we’ll be excited to develop it for you. Your feedback along the way will ensure that we’re moving in the right direction. Let’s set out on this adventure together!
Meet the team behind Anitons! Our core team has been working together for the past 3 years on our previous game, Lumberhill, and since the beginning, in January we welcomed a couple of new team members. All of us are thrilled to work on this game, and right now we can’t wait to start full production. If Kickstarter will be successful, we have a plan to extend our team with talented artists to bring your game to an even higher level.
Below you can find our sketch of the Anitons project roadmap. The plan below includes working on all of the stretch goals we've prepared, so the final release date won't surprise us if we do hit those later stretch goals.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is our first Kickstarter campaign, but it’s not our first project. We’ve been working in a team for over three years now. Even considering Anitons is our biggest production to date, we’re prepared in terms of the technology and skills required to finish this project. At this point in time, we have been developing Anitons for almost a year.

We have used all of our experience in planning development and the budget for Anitons. Quality and deadlines are the most fundamental aspects of our work since our team is working in Agile. Quality is not only graphic that can be measured, but also gameplay and player experience. Having this in mind, we’re prepared to sacrifice minor graphical content if this can help shape Anitons into a game you will enjoy for many hours.

Since the beginning of the development, we’ve been transparent with our goals and development process and we’ll keep on doing this until the full release. As a backer, you've helped us a lot already, but there’ll be many more occasions where you can shape the final look of the Anitons. At this point in time we cannot say if we’ll be able to develop Anitons if we won’t hit our initial $75k stretch goal, but with fans as you this shouldn’t be our concern.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Reusability and recyclability
In our project we don't use papper and plastic. All copies are available online.
Sustainable Distribution
All messages and the codes for the game will be sent by email.

updates.update_userinfo: Want to help? Wishlist Anitons on Steam
updates.update_content:
Hi everyone! We are excited to announce our Steam Page launch. If you want to support Anitons, wishlist the game on Steam, please. This will help us get more recognition and help with the publishing plan we're working on. 
 Wishlist here 
Thank you so much for your support!

updates.update_userinfo: Anitons - What's next?
updates.update_content:
Hello everyone,
We’d like to share some news with You. First of all, as You can see our Kickstarter failed to reach our goal. But it's not the end, we still have plans to go forward. Now we will focus on getting a publisher, and we're making a demo which may make that task easier. Because of that, we may have less time to interact with You. The next thing is our Patreon. From now on, You can support us there. We also want to ask some of You to contribute. If You have skills and would like to help, we will gladly appreciate Your help during these times.
If you want to know more about our future plans join us on Discord on Q&A session,  on Monday 14 PM CET / 8 AM ET.

updates.update_userinfo: Kickstarter Makeover, +7 days and new Stretch Goals!
updates.update_content:
Hi! Thanks to the Kickstarter team we had a chance to extend our campaign by additional 7 days. We used this chance to apply community feedback and trim our stretch goals. We decided to focus on one console - Xbox, and prioritize Online Coop over the additional mechanics that don’t influence the game so much. This will allow us to drastically decrease the budget for them, and make it possible to reach during the remaining days. 
Take a look at the new stretch goals plan:

updates.update_userinfo: Brand new gameplay footage + Last Hours sale!
updates.update_content:
Hi everyone! We prepared a special Last Hours sale for everyone that is still hesitating to support Anitons. Help us make the final push and get to our goal. You can get a Champion and Ancient Trainer pledge at the lower prices till the end of the Kickstarter Campaign!
We also prepared for you something brand new to show off. New gameplay footage presents a building mechanic. It's at an early stage at the moment, but it's a ton of fun already!

updates.update_userinfo: New combat gameplay - Sharker the Water Aniton!
updates.update_content:
Hi everyone! We have something new and fresh to show off. The Sharker gameplay, where a player fights a wild Explinho. It's the first time you can see melee combat in Anitons!
Sharker is the final stage evolution of the Ottim line, and it's a water type. It's focused on melee combat and has skills that help him get to the enemy fast. You can see Dive ability, which is unique to the Sharker, and during the dive, he is immune to most damage. Explihno is a tough target, and won't give up easily, but each water attack is super effective against him.

updates.update_userinfo: We reached 50k USD - 2/3 of our goal!
updates.update_content: Thanks to all your love and generous support we reached another milestone in our journey towards the Kickstarter goal. To celebrate we would like to introduce a new pledge: a Digital Patronage. It will allow getting Closed Alpha access to Anitons and digital prizes without any physical shipping. If this sounds interesting to you, check it out in our Rewards section.

updates.update_userinfo: Weekend sale for Exclusive Aniton!
updates.update_content:
Hi! I wanted to thank you for supporting our project! We're excited about how fast we're moving towards our goal. We prepared another special weekend sale, this time for Exclusive Aniton and matching outfits. It's a great time to get it if you missed out on an opportunity to get an Early Bird. This one works just as an Ancient Trainer pack, but it has a lower price. Stay safe out there!
-Bolo

updates.update_userinfo: We reached half of our goal! To celebrate we just launched a Weekend Sale and Addons!
updates.update_content: Hi guys! Thanks to all the support you gave us we are at half of our goal. It's fantastic to see how far we gone together in just 7 days.  I want to thank you all for the support, and I think it's not an accident it had happened on my birthday :D!

updates.update_userinfo: Plushies show off!
updates.update_content:
Hi everyone! 
Thanks to your support, we are halfway through our goal! We picked up our plushies and tried to showcase them for you, check them out here:
Let me know which one you would choose and why!

campaign.story:
Looking for a handy chart to quickly compare all pledge levels? Click here!



 We'll be updating this section with more media and information throughout the campaign. Can't wait to play? Be sure to check out our early look demo on Tabletopia or Tabletop Simulator!
PLAY


 Check back throughout the campaign for more videos & media! 
Shipping will be charged after the campaign ends, in the post-campaign Pledge Manager. We plan to offer the best shipping rate we can to backers while making sure your game arrives in the best possible condition. We will be working with Quartermaster Logistics for the US and other well-respected fulfillment partners in the EU, UK, Canada, Australia, and Asia.
We have already begun working with these partners and are currently seeing shipping prices between $15 - $30 USD for most backers in the US, UK. EU, CA, AU/NZ, China, and Asia, but as the project grows with stretch goals this may change for some regions. We will keep you up to date on the current shipping estimates as they are revised, but be aware that we will not be able to custom quote everyone during the campaign. For backers outside those regions, we will ensure that we ship from the most cost-effective locations.
2020 has seen shipping prices fluctuate greatly and we are expecting that trend to continue into next year. Additionally, some changes are being put in place for EU/UK customs in 2021 that may affect shipping prices going forward in those countries. Note that this will NOT affect us providing customs-friendly shipping to our backers.
Please note that shipping is also notoriously unreliable in some regions such as Russia and Brazil. Because of high loss and damage rates, Arcane Wonders will not be able to reship lost packages to these countries without additional cost. We certainly welcome citizens of Megalopolis from all these regions, but please be aware of this before backing.
 This project is promoted by Green Inbox
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Arcane Wonders LLC has been producing tabletop games and distributing them worldwide for over a decade. With dozens of published titles under our belt, we know every step of what it takes to get this game onto your doorstep on time and in pristine condition. We are seasoned veterans of international logistics and have included time in our shipping estimates for potential delays and unforeseen circumstances.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Comic Preview
updates.update_content:
Hello friends
Today’s update is very brief, and a bit different from our typical posts. Right now we’re in the middle of a major sprint to wrap up the expansions’ comic books, which were added to this campaign via stretch goals. We’ve been having so much that we felt we needed to share a quick behind-the-scenes preview of how they’re made!

updates.update_userinfo: Miniatures, Cards, & Comics!
updates.update_content:
Greetings Citizens of Megalopolis!
It’s been a bit since our last update, and we can’t thank everyone enough for all your patience while we’re busy bringing everything together behind the scenes. While we have manufacturing and production updates on the horizon, we couldn’t wait another minute to share some previews of what our artists and developers have been working on over the past few weeks. There is a lot to share, so let's jump right in!

Miniatures

updates.update_userinfo: Sentinel Comics News!
updates.update_content:
Hey folks!
We hope this update finds you happy and healthy in these first few weeks of spring. Today’s update is brief; we just wanted to touch base and share some of the art coming in as we polish off the expansion content!

updates.update_userinfo: Box Breakdown Info & Miniature Preview
updates.update_content:
Hello friends!
We hope the first few months of 2021 have been treating you well, including plenty of time for games amongst the crazy winter weather! We have two important things to share today, so let’s jump right in.

updates.update_userinfo: Pledge Manager is open! And other fun things :)
updates.update_content:
Greetings heroes!
Today is the day! After extensive logistical coordination, the Freedom Five Pledge Manager is finally live!

Invites

updates.update_userinfo: So long, 2020!
updates.update_content:
Hello friends!
We hope this update finds you all happy, healthy, and riding out the final hours of 2020 with some games! As this year comes to a close, we’re reflecting on how fortunate we are to have a community as passionate and supportive as you folks by our side. 2020 has been a long and winding road for all of us, but as the newest pieces of Freedom Five come together, we’re feeling incredibly optimistic about what the future has in store!

updates.update_userinfo: Feeling Thankful :)
updates.update_content:
Hey folks!
Hope everyone is staying safe and sane as we charge headfirst into the holiday season. Today's update is on the shorter side, but we wanted to touch base to let you know how immensely thankful we are for you all! 2020 has been a crazy year all around, and we are beyond grateful to be a part of this incredible community of gamers.

Incoming art

updates.update_userinfo: 5,868 Heroes Strong
updates.update_content:
Hello Heroes! 
Not going to lie, we’re feeling pretty emotional right now.

In the past hour or so (and truthfully the entire length of this campaign) you folks have shared some incredible, heartwarming words about this project and our team. Kickstarter campaigns are long and winding roads, that rarely go exactly as planned. Freedom Five is no exception; this campaign has been an absolute roller coaster of ups and downs, no doubt about it.

updates.update_userinfo: Over $900k and still climbing in the final hour

project_data.project_name: Freedom Five: A Sentinel Comics Board Game

campaign.story:
Sunshine Manor is the prequel to Camp Sunshine, a love letter to retro gaming and classic 1980s horror films. The game takes inspiration from movies such as From Beyond, Friday the 13th, and A Nightmare on Elm Street, while mixing gameplay mechanics from games such as the beloved – and long-running - The Legend of Zelda, Resident Evil and Silent Hill series.
When it comes to horror games, Sunshine Manor is all about the tension, rather than purely relying on jump scares - although, we do have a few of those too! The game aims to deliver many features that will help it differ from your typical horror game, with things such as:

 Beautiful hand-drawn 8-bit pixel art
   Explore a changing Mansion and journey between the mortal and demon realms
   A fantastic 1980s synthwave soundtrack written just for Sunshine Manor
   Power-ups and Costumes to help you in your quest
   Cross paths with a host of unique characters
   With a bit of comedy in there as well!
  First and foremost, Ada isn’t your typical 1980s horror movie damsel in distress. Although she might be trapped inside the Sunshine Manor, Ada is more than capable at stopping the unfolding nightmare and ending the Shadow Man’s reign of terror over the ghostly inhabitants of the old Aitken House.
Ada doesn’t have just her wits to protect her though. Her latent psychic powers are triggered as she enters the Mansion, allowing her to vanquish demons, ward off the Shadow Man and solve devious puzzles that would trap any normal human.
However, with every reward there is also a great risk at hand. The range of your psychic abilities is a bit short, so you have to get close to vanquish these evil rascals and force the Shadow Man back into his lair. Miss, and you’re in a world of trouble…
The old Aitken House has sat abandoned for the past four years. The local children have told stories of the gruesome murders that happened there all those years ago. Ada and her two friends pluck up the courage to knock on the door… the rest is for you to discover!
Whilst this is a game set entirely within a single location, the mansion itself changes over time, with new areas unlocking during your quest to stop the Shadow Man. You’ll find items, keys, costumes, hidden rooms and more, all within the beautiful hand-drawn rooms and corridors you’ll explore.
Not content with just the mortal realm? Well, you will also be able to make your way through the Demon Realm and its roster of baddies. Some are out for blood, while others are – somehow - a little bit more relaxed. To give you an idea of what to expect, here’s a rundown of some of these creatures.
Back in 2015 when we were hard at work on building up Camp Sunshine, we wanted to include a whole host of costumes and power-ups within the game that players could unlock as they progressed. However, as the game’s development continued, we realized doing that would take away from the type of game we were trying to create… One built on the premise that you were constantly hunted down, unable to fight.
With Sunshine Manor, and the introduction of Ada’s rather awesome psychic powers, it’s the perfect time to give you a whole host of weird and wonderful looks and new powers you can unlock as the story unfolds.
Want to wield the power of purple plasma? Then the Plasmancer costume is going to be perfect for you! Just make sure you keep them safely stored away when you’re not using them since, if you’re not careful, they could be lost forever!
We're happy to announce that we'll be partnering with Premium Edition Games to give backers the chance to pledge for a Premium Edition physical Nintendo Switch cartridge that will include not only Sunshine Manor but also Camp Sunshine too! 
This version will include a Kickstater Exclusive Cover, a Kickstarter Exclusive Slipcover, a Full Color Manual, and a Kickstater Exclusive Trading Car
But wait... there's more! On top of this, Premium Edition Games will also be working on a Kickstarter Exclusive Sunshine Edition that will include everything from the Premium Edition described above, alongside the soundtrack for Sunshine Manor on an Old-School Cassette Tape, a pair of gnarly Sunshine Manor Sweatbands, a full color printed guide, and the Kickstarter Exclusive Premium Edition Trading Card will be signed by Fossil Games! Oh, and it will all be housed inside of a VHS Clamshell Box, for that old-school 1980s look and feel!
In 2016 we released what we thought would be a small game called Camp Sunshine, which went on to be featured by prominent YouTubers across the world. In Camp Sunshine you played as Jez, an unarmed teenager, who was being stalked by a deranged mascot in a bear costume brandishing a rather larger knife. 
We’re delighted to let everyone know that backing this Kickstarter project not only gets you a copy of Sunshine Manor, but also a copy of Camp Sunshine! 
Depending on which tier you back, you could get the games on Steam, or get digital console copies of each one! 
On top of this, you can also pledge for the physical Nintendo Switch copy of the Sunshine Anthology, which features Sunshine Manor and Camp Sunshine on a Nintendo Switch cartridge! How awesome is that!?
PLAY

With a game based heavily on our love of 1980s horror movies, we had to create a score in the vein of John Carpenter, Tangerine Dream and Angelo Badalamenti. Want to take a listen to some of the tracks?



Since Premium Edition will not be shipping backers their physical Premium Edition Nintendo Switch copy - or their Sunshine Edition! - until 2021 (once Sunshine Manor's development has been completed and the game has a digital release date), shipping costs will be charged to backers next year. 
Shipping will be charged after this Kickstarter finishes and this will be based on actual costs incurred to ship and is collected via our pledge manager system. This allows us to charge fairly for all backers and avoid a "one size fits all" mentality to shipping. 

We are working directly with Premium Edition Games and will be using their fulfilment centers and partners to ensure that your order ships quickly and the DDP is included so that you can get your physical rewards without any extra hassles!
Limited Edition Cover by Graham Humphreys!
Graham Humphreys is a British illustrator and visual artist best known for producing classic movie posters. During the 1980s, Graham worked alongside Palace Pictures producing posters and more for movies including Basket Case, The Evil Dead and Nightmare on Elm Street too!
As you might have already guessed, Sunshine Manor (and Camp Sunshine!) are huge homages to 1980s horror movies, which made Graham a big name on our dream wishlist to have as the designer for our game's cover art, so we really couldn’t be happier!
Before we forget, we're here to report that there's certainly a dog in Sunshine Manor. As you can see below, you can interact with said dog, and that means that, yes, you can pet the dog in Sunshine Manor! 
So ... meet Gnarlie!
Gnarlie is also pretty intelligent (if we do say so ourselves) as he knows to keep out of the way of things that might be important in the Manor!
We are Paul and Josh, two old farts based in the UK and the US who began creating games over our shared love of retro gaming, pixel art with outlines, and 1980s horror movies. Back in 2016 we released the cult hit Camp Sunshine and we were thrilled when it gathered a hugely positive reaction on Steam!
Both of us make these games as a side project as we just love creating retro styled games dripping in horror. The success of this Kickstarter project would allow us to take a year off from our jobs to concentrate on developing Sunshine Manor full-time!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We have the development experience needed to make Sunshine Manor thanks to our work on Camp Sunshine.

With your support, we'll be able to dedicate our time in full to completing Camp Sunshine for a Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, XBO, and PC release in 2021.

If, for some reason, the game's development is delayed, we'll be sure to let you, our backers, know right away. Rest assured that any potential delay will only exist if we believe that an extra bit of time polishing the game is needed so that you can have the best digital - and physical - game we can give you!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
